label: AB_oP8_57_d_d-001
title: TlF-II Structure
comments:
This is the true low-temperature ground state of TlF. Like the depreciated \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_oF8_69_a_b-001}{$B24$ structure}, it is a distortion of the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_cF8_225_a_b-001}{rock salt (B1) structure}. 
 At higher temperatures TlF transforms into TlF-I, which is isostructural with \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_tP4_129_a_c-001}{litharge (tetragonal PbO, $B10$)}.
